comments.text:
I used to be a Republican when I was 14-21, to the dismay of most members 
of my immediate family.  The shit they talk about sounded correct on 
paper.  But when you're in the loop, and you hear the kind of shit they 
talk about and really believe, you start to realize that these 
motherfuckers are crazy!  I have been a liberal Democrat ever since!  And 
it just goes to show you, when you actually think about the things you 
believe, and you don't just blindly follow things that look correct from 
the outside, anybody with half a brain would never choose the things the 
Republicans believe in!!  When you grow up, you put stupid thinking aside, 
and become a Democrat!﻿

comments.text:
Jonathan Krohn should have never been taken seriously. Over time, I have 
evolved on my political opinions. But that is different from being one 
thing, and then changing your mind to become the complete opposite. I don't 
think the criticism of Krohn is for being liberal. It's for being a kid who 
doesn't know what he is. Let him find himself, but don't take him 
seriously.﻿

comments.author: Guard ian

comments.text:
+Plethrin Experiments and studies have shown that people want to work, but 
the work needs to be meaningful. In prison, inmates with good behavior were 
granted with jobs - it was a reward. People have a natural tendency to 
contribute, but in the society we currently live in; it's hard to get up in 
the morning for a low paid meaningless job so you can make the people at 
the top richer. People should get a wage from the Government for doing 
absolutely nothing. Why? Because all the free time as studies have shown; 
will be helping the community. People will volunteer to work meaningful 
jobs. If you were to put every citizen on benefits, you will find the 
people who are currently on benefits who don't need it, will want to help 
the community.

comments.text:
We really need everyone to live by the phrase "you do you boo." Be 
yourself, practice your religion, live where you want, eat what you want, 
be what you want, and identify as what you want. Freedom is exactly that. 
Freedom is multiculturalism and diversity, but its also respect and 
understanding and love for one another. Its ok to be conservative, its ok 
to be liberal, its ok to be communist, or socialist, or gay or bi or trans 
or muslim or british or hindu. YOU DO YOU thats all that matters. We need 
to accept people the way they are, and just learn to shut the fuck up and 
listen sometimes. Half the world's problems would be solved if people were 
just a bit more open minded. ﻿

comments.text: +Domandol That's Fox News for you lol
comments.author: Mitchell Farrington

comments.text:
+Joe Faultroy I was very troubled when I lived in the US at the large 
numbers of 'hard' Conservatives amongst young people. I put this down to a 
failure of the education system on one hand, a failure of parenting and the 
duty to inculcate in our young a real sense of humanity and ethics on the 
other. I'm not really surprised that "Libertarianism" is popular amongst 
the young because it is a world view that requires its adherents to have no 
knowledge of the world and its complexity, no appreciation of Humanity or 
"The Common Good" and little experience of the degree of corruption in our 
present 'two party state'. So it's actually an ideal stance for children 
and adolescents if you think about it.
comments.author: 2001Horatio

comments.text:
+joe cole What they are called is *not* the issue! Please go back 
and re-read my message: Congress has *two* houses; The Senate and the House 
of Representatives. +Emperor_of_the_World answered you question, and did so 
quite correctly. If you wish to be unambiguous, and want +
Emperor_of_the_World to list his representatives, then ask, "Who are your 
representatives?" You said, "A liberal is someone doesn't know the name of 
his congressman". The claim is yours, so the burden of proof falls on you, 
and so far you have yet to prove yourself correct.

comments.text: +Adrian Lackey a senator is not called Mr. Congressman.

Doug Lamalfa CA 1st District House of Representatives

Now what?
comments.author: Emperor_of_the_World

comments.text:
+joe cole The House of Congress includes the upper house (The Senate) and 
the lower house (The House of Representatives). Congressmen include 
Senators and Representatives. It took a liberal to point this out to you.
comments.author: Adrian Lackey

comments.text:

Further more I am sick and tired of people thinking that it is hyperbole to 
be ever watchful of our govt and the power that it takes from its citizens. 
You think comparison to Stalin is eye rolling absurd, really? Are you aware 
that John Kerry sat in meetings after he got home from Viet Nam. In these 
meetings were home grown far left zealots that bombed targets in the United 
States when asked by FBI undercover agent what they would do in their 
society to those who did not conform they thought they would round them up 
and put them in reform schools when asked what they would do with the ones 
that would not free for they said they would have to be killed when asked 
how many they thought they would have to kill the answer was 25 million 
this man escaped conviction on homegrown terrorism and sat on board with 
Barack Obama in Chicago so don't give me your crap about how everything is 
OK
comments.author: Clint Vick

comments.text:
And once again you reply is an insult to the fact that there was a previous 
entry in the discussion. You ignore what I say completely. So completely, 
in fact, that it can only be on purpose. You sir are nothing but a troll, 
and I regret ever having spoken to you, even if I actually did discover 
something along the way. This is the YouTube comment section after all......
comments.author: garagavia

comments.text:
And still no point of fact talk about fox news. Still no case in point. If 
you are at odds with centralized government then why do you think I'm 
twisted and why do you think my point of view is so screwed. Stalin is not 
clichéd , you dumb ass, our president has all but quoted him and any 
comparison to centralized govt gone amuck is just that, a comparison to 
what happens when we lose our voice and send all of our money and free 
choice to Washington. To NOT compare and learn is absurd, you moron. The 
push of this administration to the left both has not worked and has caused 
the damage that I believe was planned. Obama is not dumb. He is a far far 
left ideologue as evidenced by his own voice in old speeches. To point at 
past failures and current failures of the kind of govt he is pushing for is 
merely using my head. Massive centeralized govt fails every time it is 
tried either leading to starvation, murder and the creation of an elite 
govt ruling party or just making sure that misery is spread around to all. 
Who tells this story? Fox news . Of course they tell the other side too but 
you would not know that as your favorite form of news seems to be people 
talking about fox news..brilliant
comments.author: Clint Vick

comments.text:
+Clint Vick This is what I mean. Stalin? Really? Cloud you be more cliché? 
I do not squelch debate; I started it, so saying that is completely 
retarded. Why do you disgust me? Because you have such a twisted view of 
the world, and might, more than I could ever imagine agree with you, or 
have some other kind of state like it. I am not saying that being a right 
hand extremist such as you should not be allowed, the same way would not be 
for disallowing any religion, or any crazy idea people might have. I love 
the fact that we have different views, truly I do, but I despise your lack 
of understanding. You do not reply to what I say. You do not understand 
what I say, which is why the debate is futile. Whatever arguments i might 
then present would not reach you, so why bother? I do actually have better 
things to do than to talk to someone who will, no matter what i say, 
believe the same fucking thing.
Have you ever heard people say Americans are brainwashed? This is what they 
mean. It is lack of reason, coming from having lived a life where reason 
was presented differently than what is natural.
Your statement: "I also find it amazing that you wanted to constrain this 
conversation to Fox News because you could tell that I had a broad 
understanding of how massive centralized government works" is so wrong that 
it is on the brink of utter ridicule. Do not believe me? (And I am not 
surprised...) fine, check out my country then. I am the farthest thing you 
could be from a patriot, ashamed of my country and its ignorance, so do not 
give me any of that shit, just look at the facts. Norway. You might have, 
in your narcissistic, self-absorbed and twisted country, never have heard 
of it. It is what can be called a social democracy.
Also, man, as I said or implied abundantly: I do not want you to lose your 
freedom. I do not want to take your patriotism, your values, and your 
opinions away from you. If you do not believe me, then that is your problem.
And one more thing... It is funny because I have said it so many times. 
DONT FUCKING PRETEND THAT YOU KNOW SHIT ABOUT ME. Because clearly, you do 
not...
I am sorry for the harsh tone here, but clearly, my more civilized aproach 
got me shit. If this does not work either, then concidder the debate over...
comments.author: garagavia

comments.text:
I also find it amazing that you wanted to constrain this conversation to 
Fox News because you could tell that I had a broad understanding of how

comments.text:
I think you are so far to the right that you think Fox is normal, which is

to discuss further. Also your tecnique in debate tells me that you have a

comments.author: garagavia

comments.text:
But your complaint was about Fox. MSNBC is far far more extreme than once I 
did but I did not hear a complaint about that. Nor did I hear a complaint 
about how far left of center NBC ABC and CBS are nor did I hear any 
complaints are any snide remark from the left about the mass media in 
general being slanted so far to the left what you complained about was Fox 
News. Now you want to apply a moral equivalence see and say that because I 
proved Fox News was the balance that not only does Fox News suck but all 
news sucks now and of course not this leftist video that I found you on. 
Which by the way there free to say all the stupid things they want to say 
that they can't back out but I believe they're free to say them
comments.author: Clint Vick

comments.text:
+Clint Vick Your arrogance is hilarious. That is also not what I said. I 
thought I had made myself very clear: Fox does not really present both 
sides equally, or present facts like they should be presented, which we 
both agree on, but they do balance out the news picture somewhat, as they 
strongly favor republican ways of thinking, while most others are more 
democratic. I do not think that any news network should be as biased as 
they seem to be in the US. There will of course always be some political 
favor, but Fox is an extreme. And as I said, even though they like to 
pretend that they present facts neutrally, and represent both sides of the 
political axis, they do not.
That will be it for this year, I think, but I suppose I will hear from you 
next year.
comments.author: garagavia

comments.text:
I submit it's because you don't want both sides expressed. I submit that 
most of you ideas and political persuasions won't hold up well in the light 
of scrutiny. I submit that the fact that most news agencies get a pass is 
because they sing your song. It is indicative of the left to squelch debate 
rather than win debate.
comments.author: Clint Vick

comments.text:
So if you admit that Fox News is the only one that attempts to give both 
sides to the story, then why do you demonise them and leave the other ones 
alone? I hope you have a merry Christmas too.
comments.author: Clint Vick

comments.text:
So if you admit that talks news is the only one that attempts to give both 
sides of the story.
comments.author: Clint Vick

comments.text:
I suppose your way of feeling like you won any discussion is to throw 
statements at people and tell them they should stop name-calling, before 
insulting their intelligence.
If you, with your crazy "THE BALANCE" thesis mean that Fox is the only 
conservatively slanted news network, then i suppose you are right. My 
comment however, was that their way of presenting facts is misleading, even 
if they pretend they represent both sides of some arguments. 
Also, if you expect me to give you daily responses to your comments by the 
end of the school semester in Christmas time, then let me tell you I have 
better things to do, so the frequency of my replies will not be such as you 
might unrealistically expect.
I appreciate the debate anyway.
Merry Christmas.
comments.author: garagavia

comments.text: So I can expect no intelligent rebuttal? Not surprised.
